name: Fantasy Warfare: Legion Battle
description:
Battle the forces of evil for gold and glory and be a hero for the ages!

Command a legion of orcs, elves, dragons, demons, skeletal mages, elementals and more in Fantasy Warfare!

Wage war against fiendish foes and magical monstrosities as you recruit, merge and upgrade mythological units and build the ultimate army.

Drive back the legions of evil to reclaim your kingdom. Every battle gives you the chance to win gold and leave your mark in the pages of history!

Each unit has their own unique abilities - no battle is ever the same as you upgrade, customize, and build your army to take on challenging fights to defend your kingdom!

SUMMON POWERFUL UNITS
Recruit units from different factions - each with their own unique abilities and skills - to create your own unique army.

MERGE & UPGRADE
Win battles and progress to new stages to add powerful new units to your collection! Merge units to level up, unlock hidden abilities and increase their strength!

STRATEGIC BATTLE TACTICS
Deploy units with unique skills and abilities to ensure you have the edge in battle. Place a mix of defensive, melee and ranged units to design your army’s formation and plan your attack.

EPIC BOSS BATTLES
Take on epic boss battles that will put your strategic skills and upgraded units to the ultimate test.
